EnemyInfo.Name: Super Sidehopper
EnemyInfo.Description:
A large strong sidehopping enemy that jumps around randomly. All the sidehoppers share code. The enemy DNA $2A (BaseInstructionListPointer) uses the value 0-3 to determine which graphic animations to use.
For adjusting the movement, there is a table that can be modified. This table is shared by all sidehopper enemies. In each of the follow lists, there are 2 words. The first is for regular sidehoppers and the second is for all others. In vanilla the values are always identical. Small Hop: $A3:AAE6 ; Y acceleration $A3:AAEA ; X speed $A3:AAEE ; Jump height Big Hop: $A3:AAF2 ; Y acceleration $A3:AAF6 ; X speed $A3:AAFA ; Jump height

Property.Name: Direction
Property.Description: Direction of gravity for the sidehopper. Any non-zero value is up, but vanilla typically used 0x8000
